document_data.name: Thogaf
document_data.mainbody: '''Thogaf''' was a [[human]] [[wizard]] who found himself imprisoned in the [[Fortress of the Five Vultures]] in [[Calaunt]].
document_data.Description: Thogaf was a tan-skinned man with long, brown hair, dressed in a green shirt. He had blue eyes, and slightly elongated ears.
document_data.Possessions: Among Thogaf's possessions were two [[ioun stone]]s: one deep red that made him more dexterous, and one dusty rose that offered him slight protection.
document_data.History: Whilst imprisoned in the dungeons of the Fortress of the Five Vultures, Thogaf befriended an ancient wizard named [[Yrlamar]]. Bereft of his [[spellbook]], Yrlamar was unable to escape, but he was still able to school Thogaf in the field of [[magic]].
